samaja parihaniyata mulika hethuwa math uwadurayinaduhaba jayagannapirithe balayaanagarika dharmapalathumama-ge igenaganimasulugulu upasakasiyawasak sapirena witharandeniya shri sudarshanaramayawanasi yana bauddha urumaya thambailipola purana wiharayabharathaye therawada budu dahame awasana balakotuwaajan brahmawanso maha therun wahanselowa handunaganimata apahasu ekama saththwayanawa arahadi budu guna bhawanawasorun pansiya denage kathawa:dharma sangayanawa wachanayata sima weladharma sakachchathalangama shri dhammananda daham pasalawiyath siyapatha.po.sa sa/pela buddha dharma padam malawadhammapada paliyawajira himiyanta aggamaha panditha upadhiyadewdath theralama gi saha kawibuduhamuduruwo upama ha kathandara kimehi athi dakshayekimaha siwa therun wahansesarala bhawana karmasthana wigrahayak...lowada sangarawaminisun naraka wada karanne ayi?kath ekkada jiwath wenne?bhawa sanna sahitha buddha nithi sangrahayakopaya palanaya karaganna bari wu witabauddha githayamata mehema wune ayi ?raja manduraka upan rohini kumariyatath kala kam pala deek pohoyaka silsamadan wu uththama sthawiriyage kathawapinlokaya palanaya karanawa wenuwata anuwarthanaya wennanayiwala shri dhammarathana bauddha madhyasthanayasulugulu upasaka yanu sinhala bauddhayan athara prasiddha nameki.
